item.title: Youtube/Podcast Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
*Youtube Channel*
I have a Youtube (YT) channel called The Mental Wellbeing Show in which I post 'talking head'/interview style videos every week. Each episode is 45mins long and is a discussion about psychology with another researcher. I also post 4-5 Youtube Shorts/week https://www.youtube.com/@thementalwellbeingcollege

To deliver a 45min edited video + 5 Shorts/wk, the budget is $60 USD (please note, this project is NOT a 'paid-by-the-hour' project. You will be paid a flat fee of $60 USD for completion of each 45min video + 5 Shorts completed.

*Upwork Job Requirements*
I am looking for a video editor to edit the weekly YT videos and the daily YT shorts. This includes:
-Fixing sound issues (such as background noise)
-Making cuts between 3 tracks (my camera, guest camera and a 'combined' camera) so there are interactive switches when we are talking
-Transitioning in an 'ad break' and 'show intro' before each main episode
-Creating 60sec Shorts from 2min footage that I give you each week

To see the level of detail/quality required, please view some of the videos/Shorts my previous editor created (unfortunately, he has left the Team due to taking up a job in his community). These don't have fancy animations, they just need to be good quality, error-free and meet my personal requirements.

*What You Will Need To Apply*
-Able to speak English fluently. This is important so you understand what changes I request to be made for videos.
-Respond to messages within 48hrs
-Able to meet deadlines. I post videos at certain times of the week, so I need these returned and edited accordingly
-Good quality video editing
-Some video editing experience required (don't need extensive experience)

*To Apply, you MUST*
-Please confirm you speak fluent English and have edited videos before. Please include a portfolio/link to past work, if you have done past work
-Watch at least 1 of my videos and Shorts and, in your application, confirm the name of the video or Short that you watched.
-Tell me 1 improvement you think could be made to the videos
-Confirm you can work within the budget of $60 USD

*Next Steps*
-If your application passes the initial stage, we will set up a paid trial of 1 x 45min videos and 5 Shorts.

Any questions, let me know!

Indi



Hourly Range: $10.00-$25.00
Posted On: June 20, 2024 04:01 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Intro & Outro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Intro & Outro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: Reels Editor for Personal Brand - Upwork
item.description:
Hello,

I am looking for an experienced video editor who can replicate the style of reels shown below:

Example 1 - https://www.instagram.com/p/C8SI4aNvVzg/
Example 2 - https://www.instagram.com/p/C7wAzEWsQlW/
Example 3 - https://www.instagram.com/p/C8FRrCYpWsO/
Example 4 - https://www.instagram.com/p/C7-S9xHomS8/


This role will require editing tasks such as:

- General editing
- On-screen Captioning
- Sound design / SFX / Music selection
- Transitions (especially match cuts & motion blur)
- Color grading (I already have a specific color grading theme you’ll use)

I will be responsible for:

- Creative direction
- Providing footage
- Some music selection

I will provide an organized folder of HD B-Roll footage that you’ll be able to explore to find the right clips. The videos you’ll be editing will typically be between 10 - 40 seconds, but some may be as long as 2 minutes.

We will start with a few videos and if they are well done then this can turn into a regular role.

Please start your application with the word "STREAM" so I know you've read and understand this entire listing. Also, include any questions or past similar work you've done.

Budget: $300
Posted On: June 20, 2024 03:48 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing
Skills: Video Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Creative person (Fashion dropshipping FB Ads) Long term - Upwork
item.description:
Dear,

For our German and Danish dropshipping business we are looking forward to hit 7 figures this year. Therefore we are looking for a highly developed Photo Editor with experience in Dropshipping in Shopify to be part of a new team in our organization. Your job will be to elevate our current photo’s and sometimes small video edits, to make some outstanding creatives in order to advertise on Facebook!


Please answer the following questions, if you are interested.

- Do you have experience working with Shopify?
- Do you have experience with Slack?
- Do you have experience in Canva?
- Do you have experience in Google Drive?
- Are you able to work structured, properly communicating in Slack?
- Can you work according to OUR strategy?
- Are you available for 6-8 hours a day, 5-6 days a week?


As a Photo Editor you have:

- Experience in Canva (Must)
- Good communication skills(Must!)
- Experience with shopify (Pre)
- Experience with working with workflows, video trainings
- Experience with different communication platforms (slack)

If you do not meet the requirements, do not apply. (thank you)

Your duties will be:

- Creating new creatives for all of our products (Multiple daily)
- Working in slack and communicating with your fellow team members
- Being aware of the process and making sure there are no delays.


* WORKFLOW IS PROVIDED THROUGH EVERY STEP OF THE PROCESS
* CAREER OPPORTUNITIES IN THE TEAM
* VIDEO TRAINING IS PROVIDED AS WELL

If you think you are the right person for this job and you are able to contribute to our company, please respond to this post.

Best regards,

Nick


Hourly Range: $5.00-$6.00
Posted On: June 20, 2024 03:41 UTC
Category: Graphic Design
Skills:Clothing, Landing Page, Image Editing, Ad Creative
Skills: Clothing, Landing Page, Image Editing, Ad Creative
Country: Netherlands
click to apply

item.title: Looking for video editor for gaming youtube videos(league of legends) - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for an editor for my league of legends Youtube channel.

The type of videos are mostly compilations.

Examples:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=88ugnFiuN9I&t=68s
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4oAFt45mRF0&t=1s
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1n42Pwz5F-k

Expectations:
- Understand and play League of Legends
- 24-48 hour turnaround time
-  Great at communication
-  Basic understanding of music and sfx
- Able to edit videos like the ones I have shown as examples
- 1-4 videos a week at 8-15 minutes(since a large portion, ~75% of video will playing the raw clip, there is no concrete length for each video)

Voice over and clips(most) will be provided.

Please link your portfolio as a google drive link of your past work that is relevant to this job.

To make sure you have read everything please tell me your favorite fruit!

I look forward to your application.



Budget: $40
Posted On: June 20, 2024 03:30 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing
Skills: Video Editing
Country: United States

item.title: Professional Video Editor Needed - Upwork
item.description:
Seeking an expert video editor to help create high-quality video content. As a video editor, you will be responsible for editing and enhancing raw footage, and color corrections. The ideal candidate should have a strong portfolio showcasing their video editing skills, as well as proficiency in industry-standard video editing software, attention to detail and creativity.

Skills required:
- Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
- Strong understanding of video editing techniques
- Knowledge of color grading and correction
- Ability to add special effects and graphics
- Excellent attention to detail
- Ability to work under tight deadlines

We are a fast-paced production company, so the ability to work efficiently without compromising quality is crucial.

This is a medium-sized project with a duration of 1 to 3 months.

Hourly Range: $8.00-$10.00
Posted On: June 20, 2024 03:34 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for E-Commerce Products / Dropshipping - Upwork
item.description:
Job Title: Video Editor for E-Commerce Products

Job Summary

Create Facebook/IG video ads for our ecommerce products.

Responsibilities:

Create video of product assigned, using video clips from online clips and/or custom videos we provide.
Make sure the video follows the structure of the examples we have
Also make thumbnails for the videos

Requirements
Must be familiar with Facebook video ads
It’s an absolute must you be attentive to details and meticulous. The videos should be clean without errors or inconsistencies.  
English must be good enough to understand what copy to use and edit if need be.
Must know of AI tools for voiceovers (tell us what you use with samples you made)
Must be able to use camtasia so we can share source files and I can edit if need be

If this role is interesting to you, please reach out and express your interest. Please apply using the word “top” to show you've read the entire job post. You must also include sample videos you made from scratch.

Please also answer these questions:

1. can you use camtasia to so we share a folder and edit your videos if we want (you input all the source videos + camtasia file + text overlay)?

2. Can you generate text overlay with AI and your manual edits? What AI software do you use?

3. Can you generate voiceover AI? What app do you use?

4. For 1 video with 3 different hooks (same video with first 3-5 seconds changed only). What would you charge?



Budget: $15
Posted On: June 20, 2024 03:29 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Camtasia, Video Editing, Ecommerce, Shopify Dropshipping, Dropshipping
Skills: Camtasia, Video Editing, Ecommerce, Shopify Dropshipping, Dropshipping
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Videographer needed for July interview in Istanbul - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled videographer to record an in-person interview in Istanbul during the month of July. The interview will be with our client, who is seeking to share their expertise and insights. The ideal candidate will have experience in capturing high-quality video footage and audio for interviews, as well as proficient editing skills to deliver a polished final product.

Skills needed:

- Videography
- Video editing
- Audio recording
- Attention to detail

Details:

Interview: One in-person interview
Location: Inside a room (videographer to provide or source the location)
Background: Plain black or white background
Setting: Professional
Size: Small
Duration: 1-2 hours
Expertise: Beginner/Intermediate

If you are interested and meet the requirements, please get in touch with us to discuss further details.

Budget: $100

Category: Videography
Skills:Camera, Videography, Video Production, Video Editing
